title: Good Omens: Everything You Need to Know
author: CinemaBlend
comment: This show is FABULOUS!  Magnificent Actors fun dialog Truly a JOY!
Anyone know what frame rate the 4K version is?   I have a device that plays it at 50 and another at 60, whereas most other content on Amazon is 24.
Does that mean I need Amazon Prime to watch it?
But what you forgot to mention is that this show is gay as hell
description:
People are HYPED about Amazon Prime’s latest mini-series “Good Omens” starring Michael Sheen as the angel Aziraphale and David Tenant as the demon Crowley. Based off of Neil Gaiman and Terry Pratchett’s novel of the same name, Good Omens is a story about the end of the world packed with history and mythology. Plus, Jon Hamm, Francis McDormand and Benedict Cumberbatch are in it.  Here is everything you need to know about the show before you dive in and watch.
